metadata.title: CVE-2019-0196 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
A vulnerability was found in Apache HTTP Server 2.4.17 to 2.4.38. Usingfuzzed network input, the http/2 request handling could be made to accessfreed memory in string comparison when determining the method of a requestand thus process the request incorrectly.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-0196` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

apache2 - 2.4.29-1ubuntu4.6
apache2-bin - 2.4.29-1ubuntu4.6
apache2-data - 2.4.29-1ubuntu4.6
apache2-suexec-custom - 2.4.29-1ubuntu4.6
apache2-suexec-pristine - 2.4.29-1ubuntu4.6
apache2-utils - 2.4.29-1ubuntu4.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apache2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.29-1ubuntu4.6').
